1.2.2. src.exporters.cds module¶

class src.exporters.cds.ERA5Exporter(data_folder: pathlib.Path = PosixPath('data'))¶

Bases: src.exporters.cds._CDSExporter

Exports ERA5 data from the Climate Data Store

cds.climate.copernicus.eu

Parameters

data_folder – The location of the data folder.

export(variable: str, dataset: Optional[str] = None, granularity: str = 'hourly', show_api_request: bool = True, selection_request: Optional[Dict] = None, break_up: bool = False, n_parallel_requests: int = 3) → List[pathlib.Path]¶

Export functionality to prepare the API request and to send it to the cdsapi.client() object.

Parameters

  • variable – The variable to be exported

  • dataset – The dataset from which to pull the variable from. If None, this is inferred from the variable and its granularity

  • granularity – The temporal resolution of the data to be pulled. Can be one of {‘hourly’, ‘monthly’}

  • show_api_request – Whether to print the selection dictionary before making the API request

  • selection_request – Selection request arguments to be merged with the defaults. If a key is defined in both the selection_request and the defaults, the value in the selection_request takes precedence.

  • break_up – If True, requests to the CDS API will be broken up into months.

  • n_parallel_requests – How many parallel requests to the CDSAPI to make

Returns

Paths to the downloaded data
